thread.title: Britney Spears handles a wardrobe malfunction like a boss
thread.title_full: Britney Spears handles a wardrobe malfunction like a boss | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Dave Herrera
title: Britney Spears handles a wardrobe malfunction like a boss
text:
Wardrobe malfunction: When strung together, those two words instantly conjure something salacious, thanks to an infamous incident perpetrated by a pair of pop stars more than a decade ago now during a halftime performance at one of the most watched sporting events of the year. 

While nothing unseemly of that sort went down at Planet Hollywood this past weekend, that's the title that's been applied to a YouTube video shot on Friday during Britney Spears' set at the Axis. Sensationalism aside, "wardrobe malfunction" is actually a fairly apt description of what happened here. Spears was a few bars into "3" when the backside of her outfit came unzipped. 

Never let them see you sweat, though, right? Just like a few years ago her when her outfit came undone mid-song, Spears appeared unfazed and kept it moving, singing and dancing as though nothing at all had happened, as several of her dancers trailed her and feebly attempted to zip her back up. Might be time for Brit to call in some reinforcements â€” industrial grade zipper reinforcements, that is. 
'Star Wars' fans broke... Did Adele tease a new song...
